citations.narrative:
A current record of guinea pigs on hand was not available for review at time of this inspection. There were no inventory
records kept for the last few months indicating the number of adult guinea pigs and newborns present, except for a new
weanling count recorded each Saturday. A total of 130 adult guinea pigs, 71 weanlings, and 49 newborns were counted
during this inspection. Failure to maintain inventory records can make it difficult to assess the health of the caviary by
identifying animal losses by decreased number of guinea pigs born or raised. Licensee must maintain records containing
the required information for animals which disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, acquired or disposed of
including births and deaths. Correct by February 12, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of guinea pigs on hand was not available for review at time of this inspection. There were no inventory 
records kept for the last few months indicating the number of adult guinea pigs and newborns present, except for a new 
weanling count recorded each Saturday. A total of 130 adult guinea pigs, 71 weanlings, and 49 newborns were counted 
during this inspection. Failure to maintain inventory records can make it difficult to assess the health of the caviary by 
identifying animal losses by decreased number of guinea pigs born or raised. Licensee must maintain records containing 
the required information for animals which disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, acquired or disposed of 
including births and deaths. Correct by February 12, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
